title: Travels with Lizbeth: Three Years on the Road and on the Streets
description: "Remarkable . . . irresistibly funny." The New YorkerThe true story of a modern Robinson Crusoe and Huckleberry Finn, a homeless man and his erstwhile companion, a dog named Lizbeth, and their unbelievable, funny and poignant adventures on the road and on the streets.
author: Lars Eighner
